items.title: SpaceX Officially Acquires xAI
items.summary:
Two major companies under Elon Musk will now merge, as SpaceX has officially announced its acquisition of artificial intelligence start-up xAI. The deal creates a combined company spanning aerospace, AI development, satellite-based internet and social media, positioning it as one of the most powerful private technology groups in the world. Although the companies did not […]

items.title: Lawn lovers can grab either of these EGO 15-inch cordless electric string trimmer kits starting from $179 right now
items.summary:
Amazon is currently offering folks looking for off-season tool deals another chance to pick up the EGO Power+ 56V 15-inch POWERLOAD Cordless Electric String Trimmer with 2.5Ah battery at $199 shipped. It’s coming down from a $219 tag here, which we’ve been seeing repeat since early October’s Prime Day event. While it has gone lower in the past, like I said, this $20 markdown is the best recurring rate we have tracked since October, and knowing this particular brand, it could be a long time before it sees any larger discounts, making it a solid get for your upcoming spring needs right now. You can also save an extra $20 by going with this less-advanced EGO Rapid Reload string trimmer that also comes with a 2.5Ah battery at $179 shipped.

The bundle would normally cost you $1,635 without the savings, which gives you a rear cargo rack, a fender set, an Elite headlight, and a suspension seat post – all for free (worth $366). items.title: During Jackery’s Super Bowl sale you can score the Explorer 5000 Plus power station or bundles from $2,849, more from $199
items.summary:
In a lead up to Super Bowl LX on Sunday, Jackery has launched a Power Your Game Sale with up to 54% discounts and bonus savings across its power stations – plus, essential workers, seniors, and students can score additional discounts. Jackery’s largest and most modular solution, the Explorer 5000 Plus Portable Power Station is starting during this event at $2,849.05 shipped, with an extra 5% savings being added automatically in your cart (though if you don’t see it, be sure to use the code NEW5). It’s coming down off its $4,299 MSRP here, which is where Amazon currently has it priced at, and is dropping among some of the more common prices we see during sale events. While we have seen it go as low as $2,799 direct from the brand and $2,399 from a one-time exclusive deal we scored back in December from Wellbots, you’re still getting a solid $1,450 savings here that lands it down among some of the lowest prices we have tracked – $50 above the lowest price from the brand and $450 above the all-time low.

items.title: China is leading the fight against hidden car door handles
items.summary: Under new safety rules published Monday by China's Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, cars sold in the country must have mechanical releases on their door handles. The new rules, which go in effect January 1, 2027, will prohibit the hidden, electronically actuated door handles popularized by Tesla — and now found on numerous other electric vehicles in China.

items.title: This budget-friendly 27-inch Acer Nitro QHD 300Hz gaming monitor now costs even less at $200 (All-time low)
items.summary:
If you’re looking to buy a new monitor for your battlestation on a budget, then look no further than this deal that gets you Acer’s Nitro 27-inch QHD 300Hz display for $199.99 shipped. Even though this monitor carries a $300 price tag, it’s been fetching close to $250 at Amazon. It’s an already affordable model that’s now going for even less today with a $50 discount, making it even easier on your wallet. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this monitor, and it’s now fetching $20 less than its previous all-time low. Head below for more details.

items.title: 8BitDo’s officially licensed Xbox all-button arcade controller hits one of its lowest prices today at 30% off
items.summary:
As part of its now live video game sale, Woot is offering the officially licensed Xbox variant of 8BitDo’s All-Button Arcade Controller for $69.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This particular variant of the controller is compatible with Xbox Series X|S and Windows PCs, and it typically goes for $100 at Amazon, where it has never dropped below the $73 mark. Today’s deal delivers a 30% markdown, shaving $30 off its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this unit outside a limited promo code offer that had it for a touch lower, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

more…

items.title: Anker extends SOLIX Winter Sale’s up to 65% power station savings – F3800 unit at $1,799 low, more from $150
items.summary:
Update 1/27: Anker has extended its Winter Sale (with some increased savings on select units) through to February 3 – giving you more time to take advantage of these deals. Prices have been updated below. We also recently dropped our hands-on review of the Anker SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Power Station here.

Anker SOLIX is joining its competitors in bringing back previous holiday savings in the form of its latest Winter Sale that is offering up to 65% discounts and FREE gifts with select units. One unit I want to point out is Anker’s SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station at $1,899 $1,799 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing at Amazon, though be sure to clip the on-page 5% off coupon. It may have a $3,999 MSRP direct from the brand, but at Amazon you can find it starting between $2,399 and $2,599. It’s mostly been keeping above $2,000 since December, which is when we saw the $1,799 low from Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales rise in price. You’re looking at the next-best rate today that even beats out the previous New Year sale by $100, with $700 struck from the going rate ($2,100 off the MSRP), making this quite the surprise offer. Head below to check out the full lineup for Anker’s SOLIX Winter Sale while it lasts through the week.

more…

On your way down be sure to scope out all of the major Google Pixel deals we are tracking this week: $150 off Pixel 10, $200 off Pixel 10 Pro/XL, and $300 off Pixel 10 Pro Fold, as well as Pixel Watch 4 back at Black Friday pricing. Those offers also join a straight up $400 price drop on Galaxy Z Fold 7, and Anker’s 2026 Valentine’s Day sale at up to 55% off. As for the apps, everything awaits below.
